element.name: cvsobel
element.description: Applies cvSobel OpenCV function to the image
element.author: Thiago Santos<thiago.sousa.santos@collabora.co.uk>

element.name: disparity
element.description: Calculates the stereo disparity map from two (sequences of) rectified and aligned stereo images
element.author: Miguel Casas-Sanchez <miguelecasassanchez@gmail.com>

element.name: edgedetect
element.description: Performs canny edge detection on videos and images.
element.author: Michael Sheldon <mike@mikeasoft.com>

element.name: faceblur
element.description: Blurs faces in images and videos
element.author: Michael Sheldon <mike@mikeasoft.com>

element.name: facedetect
element.description: Performs face detection on videos and images, providing detected positions via bus messages
element.author: Michael Sheldon <mike@mikeasoft.com>

element.name: grabcut
element.description: Runs Grabcut algorithm on input alpha. Values: BG=0, FG=1, PR_BG=2, PR_FGD=3; NOTE: larger values of alpha (notably 255) are interpreted as PR_FGD too. IN CASE OF no alpha mask input (all 0's or all 1's), the 'face' downstream event is used to create a bbox of PR_FG elements. IF nothing is present, then nothing is done.
element.author: Miguel Casas-Sanchez <miguelecasassanchez@gmail.com>

element.name: handdetect
element.description: Performs hand gesture detection on videos, providing detected hand positions via bus message and navigation event, and deals with hand gesture events
element.author: Andol Li <andol@andol.info>

element.name: motioncells
element.description: Performs motion detection on videos and images, providing detected motion cells index via bus messages
element.author: Robert Jobbagy <jobbagy dot robert at gmail dot com>, Nicola Murino <nicola dot murino at gmail.com>

element.name: opencvtextoverlay
element.description: Write text on the top of video
element.author: sreerenj<bsreerenj@gmail.com>

element.name: pyramidsegment
element.description: Applies pyramid segmentation to a video or image.
element.author: Michael Sheldon <mike@mikeasoft.com>

element.name: retinex
element.description: Multiscale retinex for colour image enhancement
element.author: Miguel Casas-Sanchez <miguelecasassanchez@gmail.com>

element.name: segmentation
element.description: Create a Foregound/Background mask applying a particular algorithm
element.author: Miguel Casas-Sanchez <miguelecasassanchez@gmail.com>

element.name: skindetect
element.description: Performs non-parametric skin detection on input
element.author: Miguel Casas-Sanchez <miguelecasassanchez@gmail.com>

element.name: templatematch
element.description: Performs template matching on videos and images, providing detected positions via bus messages.
element.author: Noam Lewis <jones.noamle@gmail.com>
